home.text_base_description: Stunningly renovated 2BD Vic condo in best location! Open and flexible floor plan w soaring ceilings, period dets and rich wood floors. Spacious light filled LR with bay windows, and a gorgeous fireplace. Romantic, spacious, principal BDR opens to the LR or closes for privacy w the original pocket doors. The 2nd BDR is spacious, private and quiet perfect for guests and as a large home office. The pro, renovated KIT w Sub Zero refrigerator, Blue Star range, custom cabinetry, and plenty of work and storage space, opens to the expansive DR. The DR lined w windows features original built-ins and is perfect for entertaining. Tiled full bath w the original clawfoot tub and Carrera marble heated floors. In unit laundry room. Updated electrical and plumbing, and CAT 5 wiring throughout. Lush, sun drenched shared garden. Meticulously maintained, owner occupied 3-unit bldg. Ample storage. Rotational 1 car pkg among units. 96 WalkScore, 99 TransitScore, and 96 BikeScore! A must see home!

Main Level: 2 Bedrooms, Dining Room, Family Room, Kitchen
Transfer of Possession: Close of Escrow
